question.questionA: Leaves pinnate with five or more pairs of leaflets; flowers yellow; fruit globular, spiny.
question.questionB: Leaves with two to three leaflets; flowers white or pink; fruit not spiny.

question.questionA: Leaves ternate; petals deep pink; fruit globular, hairy
question.questionB: Leaves of two leaflets; petals white; fruit ellipsoid, glabrous.
